name.description:
Unique ID of the field.

Use this "name" to refer to this field in any API operations.

title.description: Human readable name of the field.

type.description: Type of the field. JSON schema compatible

format.description: Format of the field. Applies to String fields only. JSON schema compatible

readOnly.description: Whether this field can be changed by the user or via the API.

tooltip.description: More information about this field (to be shown in a tooltip)

array.description: Whether this field holds an array of values.
